snippet: A newspaper in Collingswood, N.J., says that a marker honoring the actor, who grew up there, was brought to its offices after it was found in a dump. Jim Maley, the mayor of Collingswood, said the plaque was removed during the cleanup of a park where...
abstract: A newspaper in Collingswood, N.J., says that a marker honoring the actor, who grew up there, was brought to its offices after it was found in a dump. Jim Maley, the mayor of Collingswood, said the plaque was removed during the cleanup of a park where it hung and was going to be returned.
lead_paragraph: Though it may lack the drama of a saloon fistfight or shootout on the Ponderosa ranch, the saga of a marker honoring the "Bonanza" star Michael Landon that was posted in Collingswood, N.J., has yielded differing accounts of what happened to it before it reached the office of a weekly newspaper there and, if nothing else, has revealed how strong sentiment for the actor still runs.

headline.main: Plaque Honoring Michael Landon Is on a Highway to Huh?
